text: Mbe ŋkɨɨar Zudasan nɨɨn zav nzuaim, ana ne vuzvugi. Ana ne vuzvugiap, mbaram Zisas ndim mben farve ga surga tuavi ndiv gari. Ana tuavi ndi garav khuen rargi, ana ganɨnga, mba gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve Zisas phorgɨv kɨrga fhu, mba tuk ana tugar vhuuŋ ma. Zudas Zisas thuuŋ dorgap, ana ndiv mbe won gumgir pani farve ga sur zav nzuai. (22.1-4)
